Trade/Device Name(s): Clever Chek TD-3250C Blood Glucose plus Blood Pressure Monitoring System
Clever Chek TD-3250D Blood Glucose plus Blood Pressure Monitoring System
Fora Comfort 2 in 1 Blood Glucose plus Blood Pressure Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Clever Chek TD-3250C/D and Fora Comfort 2 in 1 blood glucose plus blood pressure monitoring system using electrochemical and oscillometric measurement.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from finger and alternative sites for self-testing by persons with diabetes or healthcare professionals, and non-invasive measurement of systolic/diastolic blood pressure and pulse rate in adults (age 16+) at home.
